name: Funshow
title: funshowtech.com
shortDescription: Funshow allows users to create and manage dynamic QR codes with ease. Ideal for businesses and marketers, the tool enables the generation of QR codes that can be edited and tracked. Users can customize their QR codes by adding logos, changing colors, and selecting different shapes. An example use case is a retail store using QR codes for promotions that can be updated with new offers without needing to replace the QR codes physically.
cons: Requires active subscription for full features
No API for developer integration mentioned

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: QR Code Generator
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers similar QR code creation tools

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Scanova
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Provides advanced QR code design options

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Beaconstac
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Includes QR codes with broader marketing tools
